Kop, fìtsenget teiok li tenga postìlSeiyi irayo, ta Tìtstewan.Kaltxì, ma smuk!Nì'ÌNGLÌSÌ: This forum is for learners of the Na'vi language who wish to challenge themselves and speak in Na'vi ONLY with others from all around the world - across country and language barriers - without the crutch or our native tongues to keep us from learning and using this beautiful language to its fullest extent. Content in any language other than Na'vi (except for in these sticky notes) will be deleted by the moderators, without hesitation.   If you need a word that you do not have, you must talk your way around it or use a combination of words that come from Prof. Frommer only.  Do not make up new words that have no relation to the corpus! Do not use the Na'vi spelling of a English word, unless it is a Proper Name or something that the Na'vi would have no word for: à la kunsìp.  If we do not understand what you are talking about, we will ask for a better explanation. Feel free to correct others Na'vi, but please do so in Na'vi only. Some of these conversations obviously will be better served in the Basic/Intermediate forums.From here on out: no spoilers, no shortcuts, Na'vi nì'aw. Have fun!  Spoiler: NìPOLSKXI:Nì'Polskxi: Te forum jest dla uczących się języka Na'vi, którzy chcą podjąć wyzwanie i rozmawiać TYLKO w Na'vi z innymi ludźmi z całego globu – pomijając bariery państwowe i językowe – bez kuli u nogi jaką jest nasza  natywna mowa, która przeszkadza w nauce i używaniu tego wspaniałego języka w pełni. Zawartość w każdym innym języku niż Na'vi (poza tymi podpiętymi tematami) będzie kasowana przez moderatorów.  Jeśli potrzebujesz użyć nieistniejącego słowa musisz w taki sposób użyć kombinacji słów pochodzących od Prof. Frommera żeby było jasne o co Ci chodzi. Nie twórz nowych słów, które nie mają nic wspólnego z tematem istniejących słów. Nie używaj wymowy Na'vi angielskich słów, chyba że to nazwa własna lub coś na co Na'vi nie mają własnego słowa: à la kunsìp.  Jeśli nie zrozumiemy o czym piszesz, poprosimy o lepsze wytłumaczenie. Nie krępuj się poprawiać Na'vi innych, ale prosimy rób to tylko w Na'vi. Niektóre z tych dyskusji oczywiście lepiej przeprowadzić w forum Basic/Intermediate.Od tąd: żadnych podpowiedzi ani skrótów, Na'vi nì'aw. Bawcie się dobrze!   NìNA'VI: Fìplltxe.tsengìri lu fpi numeyu lì'fyayä leNa'vi a new fpeio sivi fpi foyä ayronsem sì pivlltxe nìNa'vi nì'aw aylahehu a tok alìm mì hllpxiltu atxan sì plltxe nìtxan aylì'fya aylaheyä, ke lu fa srung ta awngeyä aylí'fya a fayu ftang awngati a nerume sì plltxe fìfya alor nìNa'vi nìwotx.  Aylì'ut ayleheyä (ke nì'aw mì fìhìng lelì'u a fayu tsranten nìtxan) tspayang moel nìwin nìtxan. Oel ngolop 'awvea 'upxareyä tìralpengit leRuski:Spoiler: Aylì'u leRuskiНеобходимо посмотреть в самом начале! Правила На'ви форума.Привет, братья и сёстры!Этот форум существует для изучающих язык На'ви, кто хочет бросить вызов своему разуму и говорить только на На'ви с другими людьми, которые находятся далеко во многих странах и говорят на многих других языках, без помощи наших родных языков, что останавливает нас, чтоб учить и говорить только на этом красивом языке На'ви. Другие слова (за исключением этих заметок) мы будем быстро удалять. Если нужны слова, которых до сих пор нет в языке, нужно сказать иначе или создать новое слово только посредством слов, которые пришли от Учителя Фроммера. Не создавайте новые слова не посредством того, что мы точно знаем! Правила форума На'ви и Советы для Разговора1) ***В этом форуме запрещены все языки, кроме На'ви***2) Если нужно сказать слово, которого нет в языке На'ви:   1) Это слово можно сказать способом На'ви.   Пример:  "Trray oe fa tìtswayon nìVertsinAmerika kayä ne NìyuYorkì ulte ne kelku oeyä nìmun zaya'u nìsrr'ìm atsìve."   2) Или можно создать новое слово, если (если только!) все части этого нового слова пришли от слов, которые у нас есть ТОЛЬКО от Учителя Пола.   Пример: "Trray oe fa tìtswayon nìVertsinAmerika kayä ne NìyuYorkì ulte ne kelku oeyä nìmun zaya'u nìsrr'ìm atsìve."3) Все темы хороши. Вы можете создавать сообщения о ком угодно и о чём угодно, а все остальные могут смотреть их и отвечать. 4) Помогайте другим, чтоб они больше учились. Но говорите только на На'ви, пожалуйста.Идём!Nìteng oel fpìl futa fko zene livatem aylì'ut leNa'vi mì upxare a'awve aylì'ufa amip a awngal tamel ta Karyu Pawl  Slä kxawm nìeyawr livu fwa fkol nìteng pivey mipa aylì'ut a ye'rìn awngal tayel ta Karyu awngeyä  Irayo, ma aysmuk ulte Eywa ayngaru lrrtok sivi

Oe sìlpey ayngaru lu fpom.Oe unil sami futa ayioang tsamun pimvlltxe lìfyayä leNa'vi. Oe ke 'ok si nìtxan slä fpìl oeyä eltul new tskxekeng sivi faylì'ut. Fìtsengìl nì'it txopu seyki oeti slä oe tsteu liyu. Oe fmayi ke ngiyevop aykeyey nìhawng ulte new nivume pivlltxe sìltsan nì'ul. Oe ke yiyevom sre hahawkrr kop. Ayunilioang hiyìk lamu.Oeru tìpawm. Txo fko new pivlltxe san sleyku txopu sìk, lì'u kìte'e'uyä fpi fi'u lu?

Kaltxì ma Lrrtoksì nìhawng!Nga zenke txopu sivi, talun fko ke tsun nivume luke aykeyey!  Fìtsengmì tok pxaya sute a tsun ngaru srung sivi fte ngal rivun aylì'ut aeyawr ulte pivlltxe nìltsan. Ngeyä tìpawmìri, oel fpìl futa fìlì'u lu san letxopu. Ulte kxawm san sleykusi txopu sìk nga tsun sivar... Oe zene piveng futa oeyä ayunilil ke molunge oet Eywa'evengne kawkrr...

Kaltxì, ma Lrrtoksì nìhawng!  Oeru lu fpom!Pxel Unil Akawng poltxe: nga ke zene txopu sivi taluna frapo mì fìpängkxotseng new nì'aw strung sivi numeyuru asngusä'i sì nivume 'awsiteng fte tsivun pivlltxe nìNa'vi nìlstan! Pawm pxeya sìpawm ulte ngal tìyevel pxaya upxaret ta aylahe a new pamrel sivi nìNa'vi nìtxan. HaHa. Ngeyä unil lam nìtxan hiyìk nang! Oe ke unil soli nìNa'vi slä frakrr a oel fteria nìhawng mipa lìfyat oe unil sìyi teri tìplltxe tsafyayä. Kxawm oe kin pivlltxe nì'ul, vay set aylahehu oe pamrel si nì'aw si plltxe nì'awtu krr a oe tìreran ne tìkangkemtseng fu yäperur.Peioang tsole'a nga mì ngeyä unil?ta Keyl

Kaltxì, ma Lrrtoksì nìhawng, oel ngati kameie. Irayo seiyi ngaru tsnì nga new nivume lì'fyati leNa'vi ulte pivängkxo ayoehu  Lamu ngaru nìtxan hiyìka unil  Lamu oeru ayunil nì'aw teri lì'fya sì sute a Na'vi, tsa'u nìngay lu  Slä kepxay lamängu  Nìngay poltxe Unil Akawngìl futa fko zenke txopu sivi, tafral fìtsenge frapo eylan leiu ulte frakrr new sì, sìlpey oe, tsun srung sivi ngaru  Oe new piveng ngaru teri 'awkxeyey ngeye a san oe unil sami futa ... sìk. Txo ngal sivar lì'ut a futa, nga nìteng zene sivar 'itit a san -l sìk tsa'uhu. Na tìkenong: Oel ... futa ..., talun futa = fì'ut a. Slä mì satseng fko zamenke sivar lì'ut a san futa sìk, talun lì'u kemä a san unil si sìk lu *intransitive* (fkol oeru poleng futa fraylì'u kemä hu san si sìk lu *intransitive*, oe tsun kxeyey si teri tsat). Irayo, ma tsmuktu, ulte Eywa ngahu. Sìlpey oe, kìyevame ye'rìn.

Ma Unil Akawng sì Kemaweyan, irayo seiyi mengaru! Set fìtseng ke letxopu leiu!  Ngeyä koren fpi ayli'u kemä hu san si sìk sìltsana srung lu. Nì'awve oel samar san fwa sìk slä lamatem talun oe ke law lamu.Ma Keyl, nga eyawr lu! Fìpängkxotseng sweya tskxekeng lu. Sre oe zama'u fìtseng, oe parmängkxo hu aysyulang mì wllkelku ro tìkangkemtseng slä ayfo ke tsun pivängkxo oehu. Unilìri ke teri ayioang aleEywa'eveng slä set pamrel sivi nìNa'vi ftue nì'ul lu. Oel fpìl futa srung simvi zivamunge ayli'ut aleNa'vi 'awsiteng. Mì unil oeyä tsmukteyä *vulltok* faheyu sarmi fra'u ulte parmlltxe san Ke tìyom...ke tìyom...ke tìyom...TìYOM! YOMYOMYOMYOM! sìk. Oe ke 'ok si nìtxan nì'ul mungwrr *skwerll* sì *ayvrrt* tamok kop. Oel ke omum peut ayfo pamlltxe. Txo oe unil sivi nìNa'vi nìmun oe sìlpey fwa teri Eywa'eveng livu!Oeru mipa tìpawm. San poltxe sìk lu san p<ol>lltxe sìk srak? San pollltxe sìk lam keyawr. Oel ramun 'eyngìt.

hahaha, ngeyä unil oeru prrte' lu fìtxan a tsahapxìl teri vulltok tsmukteyä ngeyä heykolangham oeti!  Txom trramä oe ke holahaw nìtxan ulte ke längu oeru kea unil a oe tsun 'ok sivi. Fpi skxekeng leNa'vi: Fko aylì'ut "pe-"hu zene sivar nì'aw krr a fkol tìpawmit pawm.  Eyawra lì'olo lu keftue, ulte oel ke omum fya'ot a fko tsun pivlltxe tsafya nìlstan. Kxawm san "Oel ke omum fìlì'ut a ayfo pamlltxe" sìk lu stum eyawr, kefyak?  Oe kin fpivìl nì'ul teri tsalì'olo fte 'iveyng nìswey.ta Keyl

Kxawm fko tsun pamrel sivi san Oel ke omum futa ayfol pamlltxe sìk, srak? Fìlì'olomì san fì'u sìk slu nì'ekotu nì'awve fpi san oel sìk, ulte nìmunve fpi san ayfol. Oel omum futa fìsäfpìl tsun keyawr livu...Fko nìteng tsun pamrel sivi san Furia fol pamlltxe, oe ke omum!

Oel kop fparmìl lì'olot a lu tengfya ngeyä lì'olo, slä tsakrr oel pole'un futa san "Oel ke omum futa ayfol pamlltxe" sìk ke lu fwa po natsew pivlltxe. Keyawr lu tsayä rel taluna pol omum futa ayfo parmlltxe slä pol ke tslolam aylì'ut ayfeyä set krr a po fmeri fte tsivun 'ok sivi.Kxawm po tsun pamrel sivi san "Set oel ke omum aylì'ut apawmlltxe ayfeyä" sìk?  Sìlatem nìhawng tok srak? Pefya fìtsengä aylahe omum?-Keyl

Oe tslolam set! Nìngay ke lu fkoru law fwa tsalì'olol peng futa ayswirä parmlltxe, fu futa aylì'u ayswiräyä ke awnomum lu. Ha ngahu mllte oe.  Oeru leram fwa fìsäfpìl ngeya kangay lu. Ulte kxawm oeng tsun pamrel si san Oel ke omum tsalì'ut a fol pamlltxe? Fìfya ke lu fìlì'oloru ral amune. Peu fpìl nga? (Kxawm oe zene pawm san Peut fpìl ngal?  Fì'u ke lu law oeru.)

Srane, nga zene pivlltxe san peut fpìl ngal sìk  Teri lì'olo' (rutxe nari si tsnì oe pamrel soli san lì'olo' sìk, talun nìeyawr lu san olo' sìk  ) oel fpìl futa oe pilvlltxe san oel ke omum faylì'ut a ayfo pamlltxe sìk fu san oel ke omum futa ayfo pamlltxe sìk. Ha oe mllte Keylhu, talun oe ke sar nìkemit mìsalì'u a san ayfo sìk. Slä oe tsun kxeyey sivi, tsun livu fwa nìeyawr pivlltxe san oel ke omum futa ayfol pamlltxe sìk. Txo ayngal omum fì'ut, rutxe peng oeru tsakorenit  Oeri fìtìpawm nìtxan tsranteng, oel ke omum futa lu nìeyawr...Lawnatem:Set oel tslolam kxeyeyit oeyä. Nìeyawr lu nì'aw san oel ke omum tsaylì'ut a ayfol pamlltxe sìk. Talun luke nìkem tsun livu fwa fkol ke tsivun tslivam ralit  Na tìkenong, fko tsun pivlltxe san tute a tse'a ikranit sìk fu san tute a tse'a ikranìl sìk.

Fì'u lu oeru ke law mi, taluna mì "Uniltìrantokx" poltxe Neytiri san Ma Tsu'tey, kempe si nga? sìk, ulte ke san kempet si ngal?.Lì'olo'teri, aylì'u ngeyä eyawr lu! Kxeyey oeyä tsa'u lolängu.Rutxe fìtsengit nin. Fìtsengmì lu tìkenong lì'olo'yä a san Ikran a tolaron oel tsawl lu nìtxan.   Faylì'u ke tsranten set, taluna ngal leykolatem ngeyä tì'eyngit.

Srane. Oe molte tsahu a aylì'u ngeyä lamu nìeyawr. Oel perlltxe set teri san Oel ke omum tsaylì'ut a fol pamlltxe sìk.Teri tìpawm a Neytiril pawm Tsu'teyur mì Uniltìrantokx, oe tsun piveng ngaru futa melì'u a san lì'u 'uyä + si sìk frakrr lu lì'u kemä a*intransitive*. talun tsatsenge fko ke kin sivar nìkemit sì nì'ekotut  Talun nìeyawr plltxe san kempe si nga sìk.
Irayo mengaru!  San Oel ke omum tsaylì'ut a fol pamlltxe sìk a fì'u lam sìlstan oeru! (Txo "plltxe" tsunslivu *transitive*  )  Oe fmayi fte 'ok sivi tsnì "olo'" lu eywara pamrelfya.ta Keyl
Korensiyu tìlatem: Rutxe fìtsengemì plltxe nìNa'vi nì'aw.  Tsun nga kivä ne tsatseng fte tsun pivlltxe teri fayupxari txo new.
Oe new livu tute a tse'a ikranit tup livu tute a tse'a ikranìl.
Ma Keyl, oel fpìl futa lì'u a san plltxe sìk lu *transitive*. Slä oe ke tsun ralpiveng lunit Ma Navi76, rutxe mìfìtsenge plltxe nìNa'vi nì'aw
Oel tsa'upxare leykolatem, hu tsap'alute Prrtonur sì Keylstxatsmenur.  (Taluna oe ke korensiyu mì fìtsenge, slä mefo ke tok fìtsenge.)

Oe tsapxalute si. Oe pamlltxe ke nìlaw. Keyl eyawr lu. Oel omum futa ayfo pamlltxe slä ke 'ok si aylì'u set a oe txen lu. Ha san Set oel ke omum aylì'ut apawmlltxe ayfeyä sìk sweya lì'olo' lu. Oe fparmìl san peu sìk keyawr lamu slä ke tsamun fpivìl eyawra fya'o.Irayo ayngaru! Fìkìngìl neykume txan oeti! Oeyä eltu teya lu. Ta Na'viwiki: plltxe [pl̩ː.ˈtʼɛ] (V[in/tr?])Oe fpìl menga eyawr lu. Kxawm frakrr *intransitive* san plltxe sìk lu mungwrr a krr lì'olo' livu teri fko a pirvlltxe teri lapo? Oe keyawr latsu.

Srane, nga tsun pivlltxe nìteng fìfya a san set oel ke omum aylì'ut apawmlltxe ayfeyä sìk. Slä san set oel ke omum aylì'ut a plltxe ayfol sìk lu nìeyawr kop, oe fpìl...Teri lì'u a san plltxe sìk oel tsun piveng futa oe tslam tsa'ut fa tìralpeng leRuski. Kxawm tsa ke lu nìeyawr, slä mì Ruski tsalì'u lu *transitive*. Fko tsun pivlltxe san plltxe lì'ut sìk (nìRuski, txo 'awpo tslayam, san сказать слово sìk fu nì'Ìnglìsì san say word sìk). Ulte kxawm tsa'u lu taluna nìRuski plltxe = говорить = speak = say. Oel fìfya fì'ut tslam, slä tsun kxeyey sivi...

Fmoli faylì'ut oeyä aylaheru tìng oel fpi fpom sì sìltsana efu.Fperìl oel futa faylì'u eyawr atxan leiu, slä ke tsun ke omum nìngay oel.Rutxe fì'ur nari ngeyä tivìng ulte tì'eyngit oer tivìng. Irayo ayngaru seiyi oe nìtxan."Kaltxì frapo!Ngengeyä nawma lì'fyat ke tslam oel, slä fpom lereiu oer a tsun oel pängkxeio fa lì'fyat leNa'vi ayngaru! Ohel ayngengati kameie nìltsan.Sìlpey oel futa ayoehu tiveiok aynga mì numenavi a mì 'Ìnglìsì syolaw learnnavi.org.Ta Tenmarkx sì oe mì numenavi.~Ayngahu"

Txantsan!Oel fpìl futa fayli'u livu sìlstana tìsngä'i nang! Oe nìwina eyawr sìmi hola aylì'u, slä oe tsolun tslivam nìftue fraut utle oeru tìtslam awngeyä tsranten nì'ul kxeyeyä holpxayto mì sìplltxe fkeyä.  Rutxe, tìpawn pawm nì'ul sì plltxe teri nga mì fìplltxetseng leNa'vi (txo nì'aw nga new ), fte awnga tsivun tskxekeng sivi nì'ul!"learnnavi.org" slu nìNa'vi lì'u a fì'uri, oel ke omun futa livu swey.  numenìna'vi srak? numena'vit srak?  Fperìl ngal lì'ut a horen *wepä zene sivar srak?[teri faylì'u a satit eyawr seyki oe:]Spoiler'A: "frapo" lu tengfya tstxoyä tuteyä sì kin "ma"t eo tsa mì fìtseng (nì'Ìnglìsì: vocative)M: "prrte'" kxawm lu sìlstan "fpom"to mì fìtseng.Px: "Sìlpay" lu lì'u *nì'aw'tuyä (nì'Ìnglìsì: intransitive), pängkxo kop, oe fpìl.Mr: "A slu B nìNa'vi" a fì'u lu nìlstan *lì'olo fpi tìpawn teri aylì'u munea lìfyayä. Ts: Kxawm ngal serar "ei"t nìhawng pxìm, slä fìkem lu tìftxey ngeyä.ta KeylTìLATEM: Oel set fperìl futa "na'vinume" kxawm prrte' livu oeru

Pelun nìtxan hola kìng lelì'u amìp lu?  Fìtseng nì'aw tseng lu tsengpe frapo tsun pivlltxe frapot ke tsivranten peu lì'fya ayfo pivlltxe!Nerume Na'vi ke leprrte' nì'awtu lu na aylahehu.  Fìplltxetsengìl kerìn tìpängkxot nì'ul.
ngaya aylì'u  fpìl oe futa set tok mì http://forum.learnnavi.org/vocabulary-expansion/ frapo a tsun pivlltxe nì'Na'vi nìltsan
Irayo.Lu kxeyey ngaru mì ngeyä lì'olo.  Ngeyä.
fìlì'u eyawr lu talun ngay-a slu ngaya nolew oe pivlltxe san ngeyä aylì'u lu ngay
Natsew nga pivlltxe san Fìtseng nì'aw lu tseng a frapo tsun pivlltxe ulte ke tsivranten lì'fya a ayfo pivlltxe nì'awve!Ke tsun nga sivar lì'fya lepawm txokefyaw ke lu ngaru tìpawm.

Oel fpìl futa krr a moel nì'awve ngolop fìplltxetsengit leNa'vi sì sngeykä'i tìpängkxot fìtsengmì, oeru le law swey fya'o a sngä'iyu sì tute a tslam fìlìfya nìlstan tsivun pivlltxe 'awsiteng fte sngä'iyu ke txopu si taluna fo kxeyey silvi nìtxan eo frapo.Set oe fperìl futa awgna zene pivlltxe nì'ul sì ke kxeyey sivi fìtxan.  Txo fko pivlltxe nìNa'vi nìkeyawr, nì'awve 'eyng teri fkeyä tìpawm fu 'awstengyem fkeyä tìpivlltxe, tsakrr nekll tì'i'a tì'eyngä ayngeyä tìng fkoru aylì'u aeyawr (fu fì'u a ngal FPìL futa lu eyawr).Tsafya, awnga tsivun pivlltxe nì'ul nìNa'vi ulte awngat kop ke txopu si keyeyil.  Set txana suteti txopu satsi fìtsengil, oe fpìl.  Awnga a tsun pivlltxe nìNa'vi zene sngeykä'i nì'ul sìplltxe zusawkrr.  Oeri frakrr 'ayeyng fa aysäfpìl oeyä.   ta Keyl
Oe tsap'alute si.  Fpolìl oe tsakem nga ral si san Ngeyä aylì'u sìk, ke san ngeyä aylì'u ngay lu.Peu keyey tsalì'olomì?

Kaltxì ma tsmuke sì tsmukan, oel ngati kameie. Oel rä'ä omum fyape plltxe niNa'viti nìltsan. Tsun ngal srung oeti nume srak? Oel new tslilvam fì lì'fyati.SpoilerHello my brothers and sisters, I see you. I dont know how to speak like a Na'vi well. Can you help me learn?I want to understand this language.
Fmi 'Learn Na'vi Activity Book' , ftue nìhawng nume.

Ngeyä aylì'u tsun tivam fte oe omum nang!  Lu fìlìfyayä txana horen a kxawm nga vay set ke tsleram nìtxan, slä frapo fìtsengmì new srivung fte nga nivume, oe fpìl.  Txo nga eltu si nìltsan ulte plltxe nìNa'vi pxìm mì fìtseng, oel fperìl futa nga slìyu nìtut nì'ul sìlstan.  Nìawve, oe wìyìntxu ngaru hola aylì'ut fte nga pivlltxe nìeyawr nìNa'vi. (Slä oe lu pxìm ke eyawr kop, ha nari si! ) Kaltxì ma tsmuke sì tsmukan, oel ngati kameie. Sìlstan!Oel rä'ä omum fyape plltxe niNa'viti nìltsan.  Oe ke tsun pivlltxe nìNa'vi nìlstan."Rä'ä" lu nì'aw *eyklì'u.  "Tsun" lu ftue "omum"to mì fì*lì'u-pongu, oe fpìl.Tsun ngal srung oeti nume srak? Tsun nga srivung oeti fte nivume srak?"Tsun srivung"ä "srung"mì zene "iv" tivok.  Oe fpìl, "srung nume" zene sivar "fte" eo "nume".Oel new tslilvam fì lì'fyati.Oe new tslivam fìlìfyat(i). Oel ke fpìl futa "ilv" lu tìkin, "iv" kxawm tam.  Oe sìlpey tsnì oeyä aylì'ul srivung ngat. Tsengpe nga kelku seri?  Pelun nga nerume fte pivlltxe lìfya leNa'vi? ta Keyl
Irayo ma keyl, ngal srìmung oeti nìtxan.

Kaltxì, ma Swizaw!Lu nga keyey mì ngayä 'upxare:Li'u *srung* ke tsun sivar nì'awtu lu.  Zene sivar li'uhu *si*.Tìkenong:  Oel srung seri ngat taron.SpoilerYou don't just help some one, you "do" help to them.Fìpo lesrung lamu?
Aaahhhh Irayo ma lekeye'unga au

Oe fìtsengeru ke tolìng nari trram apxay...  Ulte mì fìtsenge oel tse'a futa sìltsan ke lu.  Perankxo mì fìtsenge lu sìltsana tskxekeng, slä txo nì'aw ayoeng nìwotx aylì'ut serar nìeyawr.New oe tsive'a nì'ul futa pervankx mì fìtsenge, rutxe awngal lì'fyat leNa'vi sar nìeyawr txo awnga tsun ko....Seiyi irayo, ulte nì'ul payangkxo nìNa'vi a fì'u oeru prrte' lu.
Fì'u ke lu ftue...Tsun ayfo pivängkxo nìNa'vi slä serar aylì'u ke lu ftue.  Kä nePonguPlltxe txo new nga nivume fu pivlltxe nìNa'vi.

Oel farmrrfen PonguPlltxe a krr, kawtu ke new pivlltxe nìNa'vi...  Pxìm kawtu ke new pivlltxe terì lì'fya leNa'vi.Kop...Oel fpìl futa san "serar aylì'u ke lu ftue" sìk latsu nìeyawr san "serar aylì'uti a fì'u ke lu ftue" sìk.

Oe fpìl, srane.  Ta san Tsun oe ngahu nìNa'vi pivängkxo a fì'u oeru prrte' lu sìk ayoeng omum fì'u a txo munea ìntentsonal kem'ut sirvar, san a fì'u-frezit sìk zene sar.  Slä kin oe hivahaw ulte ke tsun oe säntxentseti ngivop.  Oeru txoa livu.in English now because I'm too tires to figure this out:When you say "New oel" you are using the modal verb "new" for want and thus the ergative marker is dropped while the accustaive marker stays present and unchanged.
Tse'a srak?  Oe eyawr längu kop.  Ngal tsat poltxe a fì'uri si irayo.

San plltxe sìk lu kem'u aìntränsitiv...ulte txo nga ke eyawr livu, rä'ä latem tsat...haha aylì'u tsleng lu.  Txo new nga livatem aylì'ut, latem! xD Oeru txoa nìmum livu fpi fì'u oe perlltxe, talun ke tsun oe set plltxe nìNa'vi.  Kin oe hahaw. xD

Hol sìlatem...Txo new nga livatem aylì'ut, latemsluTxo new nga leykivatem aylì'ut, leykatemtalun ke tsun oe set plltxe nìNa'vislutalun ke tsun oe set pivlltxe nìNa'viUlte, oel ke omum lunit a nga poltxe teli san plltxe sìk na tsa.  Pesul tsalì'ut solar a tsafya'o?
Srane...Zene oe ftivang...Kin oe hivahaw haha slä ke lu evìdentsial talun tsa'u lu ìnferanstx

Srane, nga tolìng nari aylì'ur mì fìplltxetseng sì ayoer poleng ngeyä sìfpìl a fìuri oe ngaru irayo seiyi. Oel omum futa nga lu eyawr fwa awnga zene nivume nìwotx horenit lìfyayä leNav'i txo new fìkem slivu sìlistan tskxekeng sì aylahel omivum ralit aylì'uyä awngeyä.  Slä oel fpìl futa mì fìtseng fko tsun tskekeng sivi nìlstan nìteng krr a ke sar fralì'u nìeyawr kop.  Awnga kxeyey seri nìtxan, (Prrton kop!) na pxay a nì'aw sngeykolä'i tìnumet mipa lìfyayä -- kawtu lu eyawr nìwotx -- slä ayfo a vay set nerume fìlìfyat alor awngaru terìng nari ha awnga zene fmivi tsat! Awnga nìteng zene fmivi fte tsivun pivlltxe 'awsiteng, sì ke krrnivekx nìhawng fa tìeyawr.  Oel sermar *Spoilar"it fte tìng suteru sì'eyngit a oe fpìl livu eyawr sì oeyä sìfpìlit teri feyä aylì'u.  Tsafya, fo ke zene tsive'a oeyä aylì'ut txo fo ke new ulte oe tsun sivar nì'it aylì'ut le'ìnglìsì txo txele lu nìhawng *keftue (oel kängin fìlì'ut!) fu ke lu oeru txana krr.Pìyevlltxe, ma tsmukan!SpoilerOel ke fpìl futa fko tsun sivar aylì'ut kemä "<er>"hu na *lì'u 'uyä.  Fpi fìkem oel sivar aylì'ut kemä tì-hu.    ta KeylTìLATEM: "tìeyawr" ke lu nì'ìnglìsì "Correction" slä lu "Correctness", oe set fperìl...
Irayo!

Mì flltxetseng lekxamtslam, lamu awngaru uvan lelì'u fte awnga tskxekeng si...  Set tsakìng kerusey lu slä fpìl oel futa tsa tsun slivu rusey kop fìtsengmì!Horen leuvan lamu...  Ftxey tutel lì'ut...  Pol fì'ut sar mì lì'olo.  Lapol tìng tsalì'uyä ralit, tsakrr tìng lalì'u.SLÄ... mì fìtsenge, tìng fkol ralit nìNa'vi layu hiyìk.  Ha fpìl oel futa tsun leykatem tsayhoren fte tsun awnga uvan sivi mì fìtsenge!Horen uvanä leLì'u leNa'viFtxey tutel lì'ut ulte sar tsalì'ut mì lì'olo.Lapo tsolun tsalì'ut tslivam a krr, po NÌTENG sar tsalì'ut mì lì'olo (Fte wìntxu futa omum tsalì'uyä ralit)Tsakrr pol mipa lì'ut ftxey ulte sar tsalì'u amip mì lì'olo.Zenatse livu mipa lì'uyä tìsngä'i lalì'uyä tì'i'a, sla ke zene (Fte uvan nì'ul ftue lu)Oel fìuvan sngeykä'i...Lu oeyä lì'u....Kinam!Oeyä kinam tìsraw soli maw fwa zolup oe.

Spoilersome corrections to help you learn."tsmukan" and "tsmuke" should be pluralized by adding "ay+" which causes lenition so you could just take off the "t". Or you could have them as Aysmukan/Aysmuke."ulte" is used to connect clauses, so you should probably use "sì" instead for in between smukan/smuke."ngaru lu fpom srak?" means "are you well?"."srak" is a yes/no marker for yes/no questions.

SpoilerSilly mistake with the plural  , I believe i got the Ulte and Sì mixed up, Sì is the one used for listing right? I don't understand your last comment, does Ngaru lu fpom srak not need the srak?Irayo ulte Eywa ngahu ma Nìwotxkrr Tìyawntsaheylu
SpoilerYes sì is used for listing.Yes "ngaru lu fpom srak" does need the srak, I just thought I should point out what srak really does to it just in case you didn't know.

Kaltxì ma Hufwe Tsamsiyu,Nga new piveng san Oel ayngati kameie, sì ayngaru lu fpom srak? sik fìtseng talun ngal plltxe ke nì'aw 'awporu.Ulte nga fmeri lì'fyati Na'viyä nivumeSpoilerYou should say "ayngati and ayngaru" because you speak to more than one person: aysmukan sì aysmuke. (better to say "aysmuk" or "smuk", without gender, in Na'vi)Kiyevame!

Kaltxì, ma Hufwe Tsamsiyu!Oel ngati kameie, ma tsumukanFìätxäleri kxawm zera'u ye'rìn nìhawng nì'it, slä ayoheri ngengaru « Hufwi » syivuyaw a fì'uri ngengaru letsuntung livu ko srak?Oe sìlperey tsnì nga tsayun nivume nìftue nìayoe. Ayoengur prrte' leiu nìtxan tsakrr a tsun srivung 'awporu leftiayu amip, slä zene oe ngaru ätxële sivi tsnì ngal sngiyevä'i ye'rìn pivam falì'fya leNa'vi nì'aw 'aw'ut a ngaru ke livu nìlaw. Fìfyari ke ftue lu nìhawng, slä txo ngal nivume horenit nìwin, nìteng ke lu wrrpa tìtsunsluyä nìkem. Ulte, ngeyä eltu slayu txur nìlì'fya leNa'vi txo nga tsun kirvllkxem tsayhrrkip 'ivefu fwa fpeiol letxep ngat 'irveko ulte ngaru txopu lirvu tsnì ke tsun emzilva'u tìfmetokit ngal.  Nì'awve, rutxe, tìng nari ne tsaysìpawm nìNa'vi taluna fo tsun ngaru srivung nìteleyng ta smuk alahe fìtsengä. Rutxe, eltu si: lu lawa koren a fko ZENE fmivi frakrr nìtut pirvlltxe nìNa'vi nì'aw vaykrr a slilvu ketsunslu fkor nìwotx. Vaytsakrr nga zene ke täpivung rivun fya'ot nì'awla.Ulte, taluna nga zera'u fìtsengmì nìmip oeri kop prrte' leiu fwa fì'it'upxaret oeta ralpiveng ngaru nìÌnglìsì nìwotx fa*spoìler* nìne'äo  :SpoilerWelcome, Hufwe Tsamsiyu!I see you, brotherThis request may be coming a bit early, but may we respectfully call you "Hufwi"?I hope that you'll be able to learn easily with us. We really like being able to help new students, but we have to request that you begin to ask your questions about anything that's not clear to you only in Na'vi. This is not a super easy way to do it, but if you learn the rules quickly, it won't be outside the realm of pragmatic possibility either. And, it will firm up the Na'vi in your brain if you can withstand being bombarded even when you're feeling like it's a baptism by fire and you're afraid that you won't be able to pass the test.  First, please check out these questions in Na'vi 'cause they can help you in getting answers from your other brothers and sisters here. Take care: there is a clear rule that one MUST constantly try at all times to keep speaking in Na'vi only until that becomes completely impossible. Until that time you should not allow yourself to resort to other options.And, because you're new here I'm happy to fully translate this note from me into English using the Spoiler below  :

Fìkem sìltsana tskxekeng layu

Fì'u lu tìpängkxo ta olo'skxaypxe.Tutean 1: Hiyìka trr, oel skola'a oeyä tskot.Tutean 2: Nga lu skxawng, tsatsko lu sngel set.Tutean 1: Oeyä sempulìl tolìng tsatskot oeru, ulte oel skola'a tsa'ut.Tutean 2: Ngeyä sempulìl tspìyang ngat.Tutean 1: Oel omängum! Oel hayum kelutralit fte oel tsun rivey!Tutean 2: Oel tslolam, kä set. Kìyevame.Tutean 1: Peut ngal polltxe?Tutean 2: Hum set, ulte kawkrr zìyeva'u fìtsengne.

Oeru leram fwa 'awporu lu tìkin a run mipa sempulit. Oel fpìl futa ralri fra'uyä law lu nìwotx ulte zene fì'u slivu tskxekeng asìltsan nìngay fte nume pivlltxe nìNa'vi nìftue. Slä, mi, tsaylì'uri na skxe mìte'lan fkoyä längu. Kea tsko ke lu fìtxan pxan nìtam fte pol zene 'evengit neto ta sempul fu sa'nok kivämunge (kämivunge?). 'Uri lu 'u nì'aw. Ke ngay ko srak?

Ma Prrton,Oel nerìn ngayä 'upxaret, ulte oel tslolam stum nìwotx, slä oe ke tsleram hapxì anì'awve.Peu ralä hapxì "Oeru leram fwa 'awporu lu tìkin a run mipa sempulit."?Oe ke tsun tsive'a fi'ut tengfya 'inglisi.

Oe ke Prrton lu, slä oel fpìl futa oel tslolam aylì'uti Prrtonä. Prrton poltxe san 'awpoyä sempul kawnga sempul lu, txo poan new poanä 'itan kivä ulte kawkrr ziva'u taluna 'awpol tskoti skola'a!Ngaru tsap'alute si oe, ma Prrton, txo oel ralpoleng ngeyä aylì'ut nìkeyawr.
Irayo, ma Unil Akawng.  Tsolam set.Oe ke tsun tsilve'a peyfa ma Prrtonä ayli'u zilva'u 'awsiteng.
Oe tsolun srung sivi ngaru a fì'u sìltsan lu, ma Lekeye'unga Au.Prrtonìri nìna'vi plltxe fìtxan nìltsan, oel ke tsun tslivam aylì'ut Prrtonä nìftue kop.  Oengaru mi lu txana fay'u a zene nivume.

Tarmìran oe hilvanìtä a krrpe ralmun oel fayt alor tafral yalur oe satsengmì.Rivol ayikran utral'em talun te'lan alusrr ayfor lu slä txe'lan oeyä zene kelrr livuNga oeru larmu ulte frakrr si'ok oel ngat.

Kaltxì.Na frakrr, oel *tìktsonerit* sayi, nìftue sivi nerìn lì'ur. Rutxe, plltxe oeru peul ayngat fpivìl poyä. Ulte tìng oeru txana aylì'u fpxiväkìm mì po! Si lì'u: ngayä eylanìl, a fìtseng, pìyeng txo po sìltsan lu. Pxelì'u asìltsan muiä layu, ulte oel fpxayäkìm pot mì tìktsonerit hrrapyä. Pam sìltsan ngaru lu srak? Oe si fì'u, ke muiä faylì'u sivi, slä sivi ayoeng puslltxe nìftue. SpoilerAs always, I have made a dictionary, to make easier looking for words. Please, tell me what you think of it. And give to me more words to enter in it! Make a word: your friends here will say if it is good. Three good votes will be enough, and I will add it to the dictionary of danger. Sound good to you? I make this, not to make these words correct, but to make our speaking easier.Rutxe, plltxe lì'uyä mì Ìnglìsì. Oe ke tsun tslam Na'vi nìftue. Txo nga ke tsun plltxe mì Ìnglìsì, plltxe mì leNa'vi lì'fya. Oe tslayam krrhu, ulte ayoeng irayo siyu ngaru ngayä srungru. Ayoeng eylan lu fìtseng! Txo lì'uyä ngayä tìpängkxo ke lu, rutxe plltxe mì lì'fya leNa'vi. Fì'u lì'fya leNa'vi nì'aw tseng, nìngay. SpoilerPlease, speak about the words in English. I do not understand Na'vi easily. If you are not able to speak in English, speak in Na'vi. I will understand with time, and we will thank you for your help. We are all friends here. If you are not speaking about the words, please speak in Na'vi. This is a Na'vi only board, truly. Aylì'uyä Lehrrap Kelku v. 'aw

nì'awla:   lì'u me.itlì'ä le.tì.yìm   double-bound-morpheme/particle word   fa/nì.me.it.lì'  lì'u pxeitlì'ä letìyìm   triple-bound-morpheme/particle word   fa/nìpxeitlì'  lì'u itlì'ä letìyìmpoly-bound-morpheme/particle word   fa/nìitlì' ( ta ayhapxì n )            ulte ha     me.lì'u le.tì.yìm   double-word compound   fa/nìmelì'uletìyìm  pxelì'u letìyìm   triple-word compound   fa/nìpxelì'uletìyìm  aylì'u letìyìmpoly-word compoundfa/nìaylì'uletìyìm ( ta ayhapxì n ) Tìkenong:Tsalì'u san« lì'u »sìk nì'aw'u lu lì'u nìmeitlì' ta san« li' sì 'u »sìk ulte tsalì'u san« lì'u.täftxu.renu »sìk lu lì'u fapxelì'uletìyìm ta san« lì'u hu täfutxu hu renu »sìk. NìNa'vi na nìÌnglìsì fu nìToìtse nìlahesì nìteng, lì'ur pxaya ayhapxì livu nì'ul ha nì'ul kop kxawm tsun ke nìftue tslivam nìltsan.SpoilerThe word "lì'u" by itself is composed of two morphemes which are lì and 'u and the word "lì'utäftxurenu" ("grammar") is a tripartite compound word from lì'u, täftxu, and renu. In Na'vi as in English or German etc., the more parts a word has, the more difficult it can be to understand well.「リ'ウ」という言葉だけでも形態素が二つあり、それは「リ'」と「'ウ」です。そして、「リ'ウタァフットゥッレヌ」（文法）というのは「リ'ウ と タァフットゥッ と レヌ」でできている３言熟語です。ナビィ語は、英語またはドイツ語などと同じく、言葉のパーツが増えれば増えるほどそれを理解することも難しくなることもあります。
Oe lìyatem trray. Lolatem tìktsìonari, slä ke fya 'itä.

Kaltxi,   Fìpol lu oeyä nì'awvea 'upxaret mì Na'vi Nì'awa tseng.  Oel ngìyop si 'upxaret ateya, ke hì'ia 'upxaret aftue.  Txo lu ayhapxì akekangay (ulte lìyu), ngal kepey peng oet.  Oel lu mi 'evengit anì'aw mì Na'via lì'fyä kifkey.  Irayo tìng nariru ngal fi'u, sì srungìl anìwotx lìyu fmawmìl asìltsan.   Irayo, ma ay'eylan, ulte Eywa ngahu.SpoilerHello,   This is my first post in the Na'vi Only place.  I figured I would write a paragraph instead of a simple small phrase.  If there are parts that are incorrect (and there will be), do not hesitate to let me know.  I am still but a child in the world of the Na'vi language.  Thank you for reading this, and any help will be more than welcome.   Thank you, friends, and Eywa be with you.

Kaltxì ma Keye'unga AuSìltsan lu frakrr tìfmi. "Perlltxe" lu wina fya'o fpi nivume.Nga zivene piveng:<<Fì'u lu oeyä 'awvea 'upxare mì tseng a nìNa'vi nì'aw (fko) plltxe. Oel ngìmop 'upxareti ateya, ke hi'ìa 'upxareti aftue. Txo lu ayhapxì akekangay (ulte leru), ke pey piveng oeru. Oe lu mi 'eveng (nì'aw) mì Na'viyä lì'fyayä kifkey. Irayo si aygnaru fì'uri a tìng nari oeyä 'upxareru, ulte frasrung lìyu sìltsan oeru.Irayo, ma ayeylan, ulte Eywa ayngahu.>>SpoilerHi,  Keye'unga AuIt's always good to try. Speaking is a fast way to learn. (I'm not sure of this Na'vi sentence)You should say:"Fì'u" for "this", "fìpo" is more "This he, this it"" 'awve" is the adj. ("nì'awve" is the adv. and don't fit here)With "lu", no "t" and "l". No ACC and ERG."tseng a nìNa'vi nì'aw (fko) plltxe" I would rather say: "place where (one) speak in Na'vi only" , but your sentence is maybe correct."leru" for "and there will be", because it's not a futur (specialty of english language), you speak about the message you are writing."ke pey piveng oeru" => "don't wait to tell me" (you tell "to" someone)"Irayo si aygnaru fì'uri a tìng nari oeyä 'upxareru, ulte frasrung lìyu sìltsan oeru." => "thank you(PL) about giving an eye at my message, and all help will be good to me."" 'eylan" became "ayeylan" or "eylan" in PLAsk if you want some precisions!Kìyevame!

Irayo, ma tsmukan.Oel ke krr aftue rolun aylìut asìltsan lolu.  Fìpo ngolop aykxeyey mì ral ulte tìralpeng.Ngal wolintxu aykxeyeyit oe ke tslam krrpe oel ngolop fi'ut.Irayo srungit ngal terìng nìmun.SpoilerThank you, brother.I had a hard time finding good words.  This created errors between meaning and interpretation.You have shown me errors I did not understand when I created this thread.Thank you again for your help.----------------------------------------Now, I likely have errors in this, too.Beyond these grammatical mistakes, am I at least getting my meaning across?

Kaltxì!Oe tsun ngati tslivam, slä fìkem ke tsivun kxawm fko a sngerä'i nivume lì'fya Na'viyä.Txo nga mì fìtseng plltxe, nìwin slìyevu tute a frapo tslam.Spoiler"have a hard time" => I don't think Na'vi has this english idiom.=> "It was difficult to find the proper words" => "keftue lu fìkem a rivun aylì'u amuiä" =maybe> "Keftue lu rivun aylì'u amuiä""Fì'uli ngamop aykxeyeyt mì ral sì tìralpeng." => We sadely don't have a right word for "between" yet, but "mì" can be understood correctly here."Ngal wolìntxu oeru aykxeyeyit a (oe) ke tslamam tsakrr a oel ngamop fi'ut/fìkìngit."lit. "you show me mistakes /which/ I did not understand the time /when/ I created this/this thread."in Na'vi you don't "give" help (actually maybe it exist, but the only approved one is the following), you "do" help to someone("you engage in the action of giving help to someone"). Then it is "srung si". What/who receive the help take the dative. Same with Irayo if you want a complete sentence. Then you can use only "srung" as a noun."Ngeyä srungìri oe (ngaru) irayo si." => "For/about your help I thank (you)." (ngaru is not needed to be understood)Kìyevame

Irayo nìmun.Oel ke tolse'a peyfa ngop 'upxare nìNa'vi.SpoilerThat is one of the things I am having difficulty with; the idioms that can't be translated and some of the major grammatical incongruities between Na'vi and 'inglisi.However, everything I write, every correction is helping me.  Here I'm learning rules I would not be able to word as questions if I were to post in the other sections.Also, the lack of idiom translations helps explain why I'm having so much trouble finding the right words to write them.So, if I were to, say, help you hunt, it would be: Oe srung si ngar taron.  Srane?  What happens with taron?Lu oeru ayykxeyey apxay mì oeyä 'upxare talun oe ke nari soli.Oel zene nivìn oeyä ayupxare anì'ul eo oe fpe' ayfi'u.SpoilerAyfi'u?  Does that work?

Oe srung si ngar taron=>Oe srung si ngaru tivaron(tsun pivllte "ngaru" fu "ngar")Spoileroe + nothing is correctnga + DAT is correctt<iv>aron => translated more or less by "to hunt". With "tsun", "new", etc.., the second verb take SUBJ.ayfì'u => fay'u"fay" is PL of "fì"Remember almost all the words beginning with "nì" are adverb and so, they can't take "a" to accompagny a noun. It is a "way of doing" thing. You need an adjective to go with a noun."ftuea lì'u" sì "oe plltxe nìftue" // "an easy word" and "I speak easily"

Oel omolum "ayfi'u" ke eyawr lolu.Nìwotx ayhapxì alahe eyawr lamu srak?SpoilerWas the rest of the post correct?Also, does other count as a pronoun in this case, if it does, does it need something different than a-?

Sìltsana fya'o nivume: fmi piveng oeru pelun oe lamatem ngeyä aylì'u:SpoilerGood way to learn: try to tell me why I changed your words:Oel ke tolsere'a peyfa fya'oti a tsun ngivop 'upxareti nìNa'vi.Lu oeru ayykxeyey apxay mì oeyä 'upxare talun oe ke nari soli.Oel zene nivìn oeyä ayupxare anì'ul eo oe fpive' ayfi'u.SpoilerI don't know if you can use "eo" here. "ayfì'u" is ok, but not needed. The sentence is understandable without.Nìwotx layhapxì alahe eyawr lamu srak?

NìNa'vi fu nì'inglisi?Nì'inglisi fpi fi'u tsun livu tslayam.SpoilerNì'inglisi or something else?  Keep the apostrophe?For one thing, it would have been ts<ol>, but seeing makes more sense than saw, as that would indicate I cannot see it anymore.  Because it is no longer perfective the "how" doesn't make sense.  "Can" requires the subjunctive infix, which I always forget, but doesn't the subjunctive mean that there is no accusative?  Otherwise, that's what is being created.Shouldn't the oeru remain, since it is "I have many errors in my message because I wasn't careful."?  The second "y" is a typo.I was under the impression that for subjunctive you still had the ergative, or do I have it backwords and you keep the accusative?  "More" isn't attributed to "messages", but why does send have the subjunctive?  Does it still carry over from "must"?Ahh, I did not know the prefix "lay".  "Lamu" is assumed because it is a yes-no question, then?Too many words are missing from our lexicons...

Kaltxì,Srane, nì'inglìsì. Oe ke tsun sivi tsa'u nìNa'vi set.SpoilerNì'inglisi or something else?  Keep the apostrophe?Nì'inglìsìFor one thing, it would have been ts<ol>, but seeing makes more sense than saw, as that would indicate I cannot see it anymore.  Because it is no longer perfective the "how" doesn't make sense.  "Can" requires the subjunctive infix, which I always forget, but doesn't the subjunctive mean that there is no accusative?  Otherwise, that's what is being created.ACC can be with SUBJ. (See above for explaination)Shouldn't the oeru remain, since it is "I have many errors in my message because I wasn't careful."?  The second "y" is a typo.You should rather say "There are many mistakes", as there is no verb "have", don't try to force it when you can avoid it. You can say "I made = Oe sami".I was under the impression that for subjunctive you still had the ergative, or do I have it backwords and you keep the accusative?The rule is not about the SUBJ, but about the first verb. With "zene", "tsun", etc.. the second verb take the SUBJ as it is not a certain fact. Then the first verb is transitive (no ergative for the subject) because the other elements are about the second one which can be transitive and have dative and accusative."More" isn't attributed to "messages", but why does send have the subjunctive?  Does it still carry over from "must"?My mistake, send should have the perfective because you say something you must do before realizing/completing the action of sending.Ahh, I did not know the prefix "lay".  "Lamu" is assumed because it is a yes-no question, then?It's not a past, because your words are here now. They did not disappear, so giving a simple "lu" is enough. (Lamu is maybe not wrong, but better to keep it simple.)Kìyevame

Irayo, ma tsmukan.Ngayä lì'ul alefyawìntxu srung soli nìton oeru.SpoilerIt was decided, from an e-mail with Frommer, that lu + dat = to have, here  Auxilary Verb "Si", Possessive Dative, and "krr"So it seemed that: "I have many errors in my messages because I was not careful." should be fine as: "Lu oeru aykxeyey apxay mì oeyä ayupxare talun oe ke nari soli."Unrelated, what is "would", as in, I would say...Irayo nìmun, ma tsmukan, ulte Eywa ngahu.

Ma oeyä mesmuk,Fìtìplltxe mengeyä nawn lu nìwotx!Slä oel fpìl futa zene wivìntxu 'aw'ut ahì'i tsalì'u.teri « aykxeyey ».Fkol zene tsat livatem fte slivu « aykeyey » fu « keyey » nì'aw fatìlatem lepam « kx >>> k », ke ko srak?
Nang!Oe zivene nì'ul eltu sivi.Irayo ma nawma Prrton!
Irayo, ma Prrton.Fìpo lolu kxeyey skawng.  Oe omolum "aykxeyey" ke eyawr lolu.Li'u "skawng" eyawr srak?  Eyawr fu aeyawr?

skxawng"eyawrAnd it is a noun => "Fì'u lamu kxeyey leskxawng. Oe omamum "aykxeyey" keyawr livu."No perfective here. These actions ("kxeyey lu" and "omum") are not over. A completely accurate explaination about how to use "ol/am" still doesn't exist, but here "ol" don't fit.

Oel omum "skxawng" lu lì'u aeyawr, slä oe ke omolum txo "leskawng" fu "leskxawng" lu "moronic".SpoilerDoes lenition cause the "x" to be dropped was my question.  Also, aeyawr doesn't seem to go with "skxawng" in that sentence, as that would then mean "correct moron".  I was going for, "Is 'skawng' the correct word?And I was under the impression that, with lenition, you can drop the "le-", and just exclude the "x".

SpoilerIn english because I did a great mistake again...Of course "eyawr" is the proper word here... because it don't go with skxawng. It is bind to "skxawng" by "lu", which is like "eyawr = moron".  Sorry sorry sorry"Li'u "skawng" eyawr srak?" => "Skxawng a Fìlì'u eyawr srak?" Is the correct complete one. But yours (with a "x" to "skxawng" is well understandable)Like in english: "Is the word "moron" correct?", it is not exactly "correct" but it is ok.So skxawng don't go under lenition, because lenition affect only the first letter, and here the first is "s" which don't go under lenition.You can't simplify "le-" when lenitioned. Otherwise there would be a problem of understanding between "le-" and "ay-" when they are not written. Only "ay-" can be omited.

Irayo. Oe ke tsun spivaw ayfìpo keyeyit.SpoilerI don't know where my thought process was going when it decided I could drop the le-.  I guess I decided that all lenition can drop the prefixes...My question was actually, Is "skawng" the correct word?"  Which obviously isn't as, it is missing the "le-".

Oel fìwayti Maoriyä ralpeng ayngaru!  Aylì'u Maoriyä fìfya lu; oel lamatem nì'aw tìnìnti aylì'u feyä ne Na'viyä tìnìn.  Pängkxo oer txo tse'a ngal futa oel zene latem fu kxeyeyt oeyä.  Irayo!--------------Tìngop Kifkeyä: Ìlä ayrol Na'viyä Polunisyayä, sute, kllte sì frahapxì kifkeyä zama'u ta 'aw mesute lepizayu Tawsempul sì Kllsa'nok.  Fìlun lu tsnì sute lepizayu Maoriyä fo kame lok Eywa.  Vay tìmunge utralyä (ha tspang 'evengit Tane'mahutayä a Na'rìngeyktan) fol sireat fpom si.  Tengkrr kì'ongit nari susi, fol tìnewt ke plltxe nìlun tsnì tarontu stivawm ulte flä totivul.Nìsngä'ikrr ke längu atan: Te'ponui (Txantxon) fu Te'poroa (Yoltxon).  Tei tawyä nìatan lam, tsawke sì sanhì nìwin sngä'i.  Tsakrr Rangi (a Tawsempul) Papahu (a Kllsa'nok) kelku sami, slä tengkrr mesute 'awsiteng namieiä, ayit feyä kelku si kehu atan.  Taw hahaw Klltehu, ulte atan kip fo ke za'u.Eveng feyä fmetängok futa fo ke tsun tsive'a, ulte plltxänge, puseng san pefya ayoengìl txonti sì trrti law si sìk.  Tumatawenga lehrrap (a Tsameyktan) nängew futa fol sa'nokit sì sempulit tspang slä Tane'mahutal (a Na'rìngeyktan) tìtslamit tìng tsnì fol sempulit sì sa'nokit hapxì sivi ulte tsafya tìfläti tìng.  Tìtslamit Tane'mahutayä flamä ulte nì'awpo 'awpo evengyä nìnawm fmi Tawti ta Klltet hapxì sivi.  Rongol (a Yomtusieyktan) sì Tangaroal (a Kilvaneyktan) fmi fra'ut a fol tsun, ulte kemaweya Tumatawenga takänguk nìmun sì nìmun.  Slä fo ke fmi.  Vay hrr, Tane'mahutal hasey sami.  Pol fa mehinam Rangit arawkesusi rikx neto Papa anguwaysusi.  Tsafya txon sì trr law slu.Hu nguway txe'lanyä, ta Rangiyä menari tompa za'u, fte ngolop hilvanti.  Tafiri (a Txanhufweyktan), a tsapo ke new futa smukìl tsa'ut si, poru txopu lu tsnì Papa nìhawng sevin slivu, ulte ìm sempul peyä kä ne kllpxìltu le'em.  Ta tsatseng po kängä nìftxavang ne kllte tivakuk ayutralti Tane'mahutayä vay pol frayutralit za'ärängip ta kllte.  Tafiril mìn tìftxavangit ne Tangaroa (a Kilvaneyktan) a tìhawnut new äo 'engeng kilvanyä.  Slä tengkrr Tangaroa tusul, txana ayeveng peyä ayskxawng slu ulte tengkrr hilvanioang ne'ìm kilvan kä pohu, aynantang sì kllioang kä kip ayskxe sì ayna'rìng a Tafiri tolakuk.  Tsakrr  Tangaroal tìfxtavangit asom peyä 'efu.  Eveng evengyä peyä holam ulte for hawnu lu mì ayna'rìng.  Nìlun vay fìtrr, hilvanìl atxkxeti yusom lu, ke nìwin, slä susìlpey tsnì ayna'rìngit skiva'a fte Tangaroal frayitit nìmun tsaye'a.Tìngop Tutéyä fìfya lamu: Tsakrr fo a kem sami husahaw ulte fra'u fnusu lu, Tane'mahutal fa kllte tokxit tuteyä si ulte tìreyt za'ärìp nemì ontu peyä.  Po Hine'hawone (a Tuté Lekllngop) slamu ulte por 'ite lu, a Hine'titama (a Tuté Letsawkeza'u), a krr por kop ite Tane'mahutayä lamu.Slä Hine'titamal ke kolame tuteanit a sempul peyä ulte tsakrr po tse'a futa poan lu Tane'mahuta a poe muntxa lu, po lu teya tìkawngyä.  Pol Te'aot (a kifkey atanyä) txìng ulte ne Te'po (a kifkey leäo) kä, a po Hinenui'te'po (a Nawna Tuté Txonyä) slu.Eveng Tanemahutayä pxay lamu, ulte fo slu nì'ul pxay, nìlun tìterkupìl foti ke eyk.
Tìng 'awfesu tìplltxe fì'uyä srak?

Oeri fìway prrte' leiu nìtxan. Tìtsalm oeyä ke lu nìwotx, slä oel fperìl futa tì'ul ayhapxìyä law nìtam. Ngenga new tsnì ohel fmivi nìne'em ngengaru tivuyìng sìlatemit lelì'uolo' nì'awla slä lu fa ral nìteng ko srak? Tsa'uri tsayun oe fmivi nìftue nìprrte'.

Tsa'u meuai oheru luyu, txo nawma Prrton peyä tìfpil tìyìng ne way oheyä.  Irayo seiyi ngengaru!  Ohe tìkangkem si nìtxan fte ohel fì'ut tuyìng ne oheyä 'olo aynumeyuyä.  Tìvìng ke ayupxaret ahì'i vay set nìfìtxele ke prrte' si oheru.

Txo lu « tìrol letìhahaw » na *lalapay* a sa'nu rol ne prrnen ha nìteng kxawm tsun ke livu aylì'u... ko... srak? K.omum.oe!Spoiler*Nulmun = "moreover" (nì'ul•nìmun)

Ma 'eylan Prrton,Tìtam oeru ivomum futa ngenga nari tamìng oeyä tìkangkemyä.  Txo ngengaru krr lu nì'ul sivi, rutxe, suyi!  Yola krr larmu tsnì « Uniltìrantoxk » wìntxu ayoengaru.  Ye'rìn ayoengaru fì'u lu mì ayzekwä ayoengeyä, wivìntxu mì helku ayoengeyä.  Tsa'u txantsan lu!  Ngengaru tìwìntxul Uniltìrantoxkyä prrte'it zamìyevunge.Irayo!Kiliyä (fu Kili)

Oel fpíl futa faylí'u *muiä lu. Fko san "fítsengmí lu" sík ke kin pivlltxe ní'aw.le'Ínglísía *lí'olori, spoyílamí kxaní lu kop.  Fíkíngit tíng nari, rutxe: http://forum.learnnavi.org/navi-niaw/(read-first!!!)-horen-plltxe-tsenga-lenavi-eltu-si-fte-nga-tsun-sngai-nilstan/-Keyl

Ma Toruk Taronyu,Oel sìlpereiey futa fì'it.ral.renu teri.aylì'u nì.nì a txeleri tsun teri.tìfpìl oeyä ngaru piveng nìlaw. Ke lu txele a lu ftue nìhawng. Ral a kllkxem mìkamtseng tsa'itlì'ä san« nì- »sìk ke alìm ta ral nìÌnglìsì san« as »sìk lu ulte ha ke lu nìteng san« -ly »sìk ni'aw nìwotx. NìNa'vi san« nì- »sìkur lu sìtsun sì tìtxur nì'ul Ìnglìsìto. Nìnatìkenong rutxe tìng nari ne san« nì.awn.omum » (a zene kivä ta san« nì.awnga.omum »sìk). NìÌnglìsì ke tsun pivlltxe nìeyawr san« we know-ly »sìk ko srak? Slä nìNa'vi fì'u lu eyawr nìwotx. Ke lu kxeyey.Tsun tslivam srak? Txo vay set ngaru leru sìpawm, ha rutxe peng oer fte tsun ngar 'iyeveyng.
Pefya syamaw po?

NìNa'vi kxawn zene livu aw'u a ke alìm nìhawng ftu san« lì'u fu *'itlì'olo a fkol lolatem fa tsa'itlì' nì fte slivu lì'u nìnì »sìk, ko srak?Spoiler: nì*TiEmAy*In Na'vi perhaps it ought to be something not too unlike "a word or phrase that one has changed via the particle nì to become a word 'in nì'", right?I don't think there is anything exactly like the power or behavior of the Na'vi nì in English. "quasi-adverbial prefix"?  - nìNa'vi (as the Na'vi do)  - nìÌnglìsì (English-language-ish-ly/as English (is))  - nìayoeng (like us)  - nì'awve (firstly, to start with)  - nìawnomum ((nì.awnga.omum) as we know)  - lì'u lu *nìnì (a word configured with "nì-" [a word existing as nì-ish] e.g.: "nìNa'vi" or "nìlaw" ("clearly"))  - *'itlì'olo lu *nìnì (a phrase prefixed with "nì-" [a phrase existing nì-ish-ly]e.g. "nìawnomum")Remember that the verb lu is not exactly the same as "is" in English. It means "be/is; there is/are; to exist (in reality without reference to a place/space); to have" so nì-words can interact with it and other verbs more broadly than some of the other Na'vi parts of speech.  Lu aylì'u apxay nìlì'fya leNa'vi a ke lu tengfya aylì'fya nìÌnglìsì.  There are many words in the Na'vi way-of-words that are not the-same-as words as-in-English.  Oeru ke lu lawa fya-o a tsun fpxiväkìm nìna'rìng      OR  Oeru ke lu fya-o a tsun fpxiväkìm nìna'rìng nìlaw  I don't have a clear way that I can enter the forest.  There is no clear way for me to enter the forest.The oeru ke lu part doesn't change. There are just different ways to say it in English.I'm not 100% sure about all this, of course, but 'things in nì-' tend to more broadly set the tone for the whole sentence (or dependent clause), but not always. We will see if K. Pawl will actually support this use of phrases like nìnì (in nì-), nìmì (in mì (for words prefixed or suffixed with mì) etc.) Time (and usage) will tell. Perhaps lì'u anì or lì'u lenì would be better. It depends on how semantically similar nì might be to a nouns or adverbs. For now, it can be stuck onto about anything. I believe I saw somewhere that he took this from Farsi, but I don't remember where. Oeru txo livu.'Upx.ìm: Tsalì'u san« muiä »sìk a leru nì'em fko zene livatem fte slivu san« eyawr »sìk ko srak?___________________

Ma smuk,Vay set frapo ke tsun kìng amip ngivop, slä oel new futa ayoeng pivlltxe nìNa'vi ye'rìn.  Fìkem livu 'awve ultxa angay awngeyä.  Set oe sngivä'i. 'Awve ultxari awngeyä, Nawma Sa'nok lrrtok siveiyi.  Oe Keylstxatsmen lu slä fì'u ngim lu nìhawng ha Keyl tsun tivam nìlstan.  Ayngaru lu fpom srak? Kxeyey si nìtxan sì nume 'awsiteng ko!ta Keyl

Set fìtseng lu fì'u a ayoeng perlltxe, oel munge tìhawngut ta oeyä kìng lelì'u ha frapo tsun pivankxo mì satsenge.Omängum fra'uti oe ulte fìkem si, ha oeru txoa livu txo oe tivìng zoplo 'awporu fìtsengemì trr a oe pivlltxe nìhawng hu fpivìl oel omum nì'ul fì'u to oeyä tìomum.Oe kaltxì si ayngaru!  Sngivä'i futa pivankxo!
Zene oe hivahaw, tsakrr lora aylì'ut nìNa'vi paylltxe!
Holahaw oe, slä vay set ke lu oer aylì'u... Skxawn eltu oeyä lu nìtxan :p
Kaltxì ma oeyä smuke. Oeri lu fìtseng fpi oe perlltxeie nìNa'vi ngahu. Oe nerume nìwin slä nìtxan nume ulte oe lu nì'it skxawng fayli'u fa.Ayngaru lu fpom ma oeyä eylan ulte eywa ngahu.

Ohel ayngengati kamuye ma oeyä smuk.Fìtrr nawma trr lu, fìtrr ayoeng sìtsawlhu a laylì'fya lu kllkxem ulte fìfyafpi oelnawma sa'nokur rol fte poe ayoengur laryrrtok.Tsun oe ngahu pivängkxo nìna'vi a fì'u oer prrete' leiu ulte sweya fya lì'fyat nivume.Fìtseng fpi säpängkxo tok slä sänumefpi kop ulte sìlpey tsnì sänume atxan layu.Kìyevame ma smuk sì oeyä eylan ulte Eywa ayngahu.

Kaltxì ma oeyä smuktu!Fìplltxe.tsengìl prrtet oeru tìng.  Set awnga tseiun nulwin nìtxan nivume.Oel ngati kameie kop, ma oeyä tsmukan!Fìtìlatemìsokx san "-uy-" sìk ke tsun tsenge tivok slä zene tivok mì tsatseng a san "-ei-" sìk tok.
san -yu sìk sì san -ei sìk, fayuri tenglì'umì ke tsun tivok. san kameie sìk fu san kamuye sìk muiä lu.-Keyl

Kaltxì ma ayeylan lemeuia.  Fìtsenge, Kiliyä oe lu (a zama'u ta Killingbeck – ral lu san hì'ia kilvan Kiliyä sìk. Ta Ostreylie oe plltxe, ta Kelutral Wrrakll.  Oeru prrte' lu tsnì ayoeng tsun nìNa'vi pivlltxe ulte oe fpìl san tewti sìk tsakrr oel kame tìtsunit ayoengyä piveng fa fìlì'fya.
Srane, oe tsa'uru mllte.  Tsa'u ke lu tsa'u a oe pìmlltxe srak?

Nga plltxe nìNa'vi nìlstan nang!  Nga aylì'fyat aylaheyä si a krr, nì'awve fìfya wivìntxu ayoengaru fa frapo tsun tslam nì'ul : *Ostreylie* fu Ostreylie.  San "Kelutral Wrrakll" sìk fì'u lu peseng? Kxam kllpxìltuyä ngeyä tok srak?  Fìtsengmì ke lu nìtxan *pay srak?ta Keyl
Tsayu ke lu tengayu nì'it, oe fpìl.  Oe new pivlltxe tsnì san "kamuyeie" sìk kea muiä ke lu nìteng, slä nga muiä lolu kop.  ta Keyl
Ah, tslolam. Oel fìkorenit omum, slä oel tsa'ut nìtxan ke pìmeng.  Irayo.

Irayo ngaru fpi sìltsana aylì'u ngeyä oer.  Oeru txoa livu txo kxeyeyt oel soli.  Kelutral Wrrakll (san Warragul sìk nì'Ìnglìsì) kelku oeyä lu.  Fìtseng tok nìalìm äo kilvan Märi (san Murray sìk), slä fpi lun a ayoengur lì'u "ocean" lu, oe ke tsun ngaru nìngay piveng a oe tok! Fìtseng ke lok kxam kllpxìltuyä tok.  Ulte ayoeru pay lu; ayoel pxayt kin, frakrr.
Aaa, tslolam! Nga kelku seri Wrrakllmì a Mllporìn sì Vìktoria lok srak?-Keyl
Srane.  Ulte nga tok peseng?
Oe tsap'alute si. Oe ke eltu si. Oe ral sami pivlltxe san kamuye sìk slä oe <uy>l na <us> fpamìl, oe skxawng lamängu.
Set oe Amerìkayä Siätllmì kelku seri, slä tìrey oeyä Amerìkayä Meynmì sgnolä'i.  Oe Yapänmì kelku soli kop ulte oe tsun pivlltxe nìYapänìsì sì nì'ìnglìsì (sì nìNa'vi nì'it  ).-Keyl

Tuté a oeru muntxe lu sì oe kelku sami mì Siätll (sì tsayseng a 'ì'usawn "Pasìfìk Nortì Oesìt").  Moe tsatsengmì mune ayzìsìt.  Oel sìlpey futa moe ne'ìm zaya'u (zìya'u?) pxevenghu moeyä.  Atxkxe alor lu.  Slä kawkrr kamä ne Meyn.  Kxawm tengkrr ne Siätll moe za'u?
San pxevenghu sìk nga pamlltxe!  *Peholpxay lu gnaru ayfo?  Lu oeru 'awa 'ewana 'itan a ye'rìn munea zìsìt layu. Txo aynga Siättllne za'u nìmun, tsakrr oeru 'upxaret fpe' rutxe.    -Keyl

Haha, oe ke fparmìl sì póltxe tengfyá skxawng! Iráyo.    -Keyl

Tírol tsolawm oel a krr, oel fpíl futa ngeyä mokri lu teng fya leFranseya olo' *le-kato-lí'-way a "Te-Te-Se" lu.   *Katolí'way ngaru prrte' lu srak?(*Katolí'wayíri lu tírolä fya'o atxan lekato a fko ke rol slä plltxe níkato fa pamtseo.  Fífya tírolä sngolä'i míAmerika sí suteru apxey míFransí prrte' lu nítxan.)  -Keyl
Nga rolol nìltsan, slä oel mune mekeyeyit stawm: nga san« ì »sìk na san« i »sìk pxaya hrr plltxe, ulte nga san« e »sìk na san« i »sìk ke pxaya hrr.Tìkenong: san« sì »sìk sì san« seze »ìk.

Oe nìmìn aylì'u leNa'vi kìngfpi lelì'u ayoeng ngolop krr a usomum nìNa'vi ayoeng sngä'i.  Hapxì tsayuyä nìhawng kawng lu, oe ke new plltxe futa ngolop hapxìt slä tìngay lu fì'u a oe soli.  Awengal nolume leNa'vi pxay horen sì aylì'u a krr ke yol lu.  Srane, awengal ngolop pxaya keyeyit slä fì'u hapxì tìnume lu, fte ta fayu awengal nume ulte slu ayoeng nì'ul sìltsan.Tslolam nìwotx horenit sì aylì'ut a krr ke ye'rìn layu slä vay tsakrr awengaru lu fì'u a zene ayoeng tivam (fu tam sivi?) ulte tut plltxe nìNa'vi!  Set awengaru sìltsana plltxeyu Na'viyä lu pxaya ulte nìtut awengaru leru nì'ul.Oe kaltxì seri suter a tsteu nìhawng tsivun pivlltxe hu ayoeng ulte oe sìlpey aynga nìwotx sivi nìteng.  Sìlpey oe ye'rìn awengaru lu tseng a ayoeng pivlltxe nìNa'vi nì'aw ulte tslivam lapot nìwotx nìltsan.  Fì'u lolu a krr oe layok ayngahu mì sasenge ulte tut srung si fraporu a fì'ut kivin ulte oe omeium lu ke nì'awpo.Fpìl oel futa fì'u nawm layu!

Oel ngati kameie ma oeyä tsmukan.Ngayä 'upxare lu ngay sì oe tslolam. Ayoeng terìran nulfay'ori nìtxan ulte ayoeng zama'u ftu alìm slä ayoeng zene kä alìm nìteng. Ayoeng zene eltu si ne fya'o ulte ayoeng zene tslam tsa'u afkeu.Oe tswayon ayngahu, ma smukan, ma smuke sì ma eylan. Eywa ayngahu.TÌLATEM: aylì'ut le'Ìnglìsì tspolang oel. -ta Keyl

Oel mengati kameie ma meylan.Oe tslolam mengeyä meupxare ulte oe sìlpey tsnì oe mengahu tswivon.Utral tsawl lu släayoeng peyä tawne zene kivä. Oel Eywar pawm futa ayoengru Pawl fra'u a ayoeng polawm tìyìng.Fìponguri nì'ul sìltsan sleru fratrr ulte slìyu nì'ul sìltsan a krr ayoengru tseng na'viyä nì'aw lu.Ayoengru stum nìtam aylì'u lu pivlltxe fra'u a ayoeng new.Aynga oeyä smuk lu ulte fpi Eywa, fpi Na'vi ulte fpi Pawl naryumeie sì karyeiar nang!TÌLATEM: aylì'ut le'Ìnglìsì tspolang oel. -ta Keyl
Lam futa ngeyä tìnewit stamawn, ma 'eylan!  Ätxäle aftxavang lu ftue mivllte, ko?  Irayo!

Oel tsolun tslivam stum fra'uti a nga pamlltxe, ma Omängum Fra'uti. Sìlpey oe tsnì ayngahu nawma fìlì'fyayä atxkxe'em oe tsun tswivon kop.  Ulte tsengìri lì'fyayä leNa'vi, perey nìteng oe!(Oeyä keyeyri lelì'fya rutxe fìkrr oeru txoa livu.)
Nìhiyìk, frakrr oe nìmun za'u ne fìkìng, pereng oeru futa mipa 'upxare Isyä lu.  Slä ke lu.TÌLATEM: aylì'ut le'Ìnglìsì tspolang oel. -ta Keyl
Txo fko tutet layatem poyä aylì'u a krr fìkìngìl plltxe tsa'ut slä txo pori ke Is lu.
Latem aysuteyä 'upxare. Txansìltsan za'u ftuflltxe niNa'vi.TÌLATEM: aylì'ut le'Ìnglìsì tspolang oel. -ta Keyl

Ma ayeylan,Ye'rìn tseng fìfyayä fpi tìplltxe nìNa'vi nì'aw ayoengeru layu. Oe sìlpey tsnì ayoeng tsayun pivlltxe nìtxan mìsatseng sì nivume tengkrr ayoeng txana keyey sivu.  Oeri sì Prrtonìri payeng nì'ul, slä moel(Sipasì-fa) mipa *forum*it ngìmop (vay set tsatsengyä horenit ngerop moel) ulte hasey lolu a krr tayìng fraporu.Ma Prrton, txo oe pollltxe ye'rìn nìhawng, tsap'alute sengi oe...   Oel fpìl futa fko plltxe san zene tivam sìk a krr muiä lu. Kìyevame!-Keyl

Kwang nga!  Oel mipa kìngit lelì'u ngìmop fte frapo pivängkxo.  Fìplltxe.tseng Prrtonur lu hu ayoeng zene pivey nì'it, oe fpìl.ta Keyl

Nì'awve oe zene pivlltxe:   san« TOMPA meNARIta »sìkAyoengìri frapo mìfìtseng (mì'awtseng 'awpesengeta!) 'awsiteng nìNa'vi nì'aw puslltxe (txokefyaw lì'uzekwä susi) a tìngay leiu oeru tengfya tìzong ta Eywa nìwotx.Ayngar IRAYO seri oe, ma oeyä eylan nìlì'fya leNa'vi.Oer leram nìlaw nìwotx tsnì fa tìplltxe ni'aw tsun lì'fya leNa'vi slivu lì'fya angay mìhifkey awngä nì*Errta*, ulte ta tìsngä'i fìtsengä nìtrram muneve tsarmun fa ronsem tsive'a oel futa tsatìtsun ke lu unil nì'aw slä tsun slivu tìngay nìwotx. Ulte, nìngay speraw oel futa set aylì'une fìkìngä terìng nari a sutel fìponguyä ngayop utralit atsawl sì atxur ta ayrina' ahì'i nìkepxay ulte ayvul tsautralä fko tsayun tsive'a ka fìkifkey nìwotx. Ye'rìn.Slä fìpänu ngaya lì'fyayä leNa'vi ke za'u hu feyä tìhawnu awotx. Nìpuslltxenìngay, KEA tìhawnu ke längu. Txo ke lu leftxavanga ayngopyu a tsun pivlltxe nìftue sireafa a ke tsun kepo fu ke'u txivey ha ke tsun 'ivong Na'vi. Tìtsun a lì'fya leNa'vi tiverkup nìkeslu 'it'evi kop ngay lu nìlaw, ulte tsa'uri oer txopu lu nìtxan. Ftxavang nì'aw'u ke tama tìsrung layängu. Tìtsteu, tìkllfrivo', tìler, tìnekxsì krrä nìtxan tsranten nìwotx, ulte fì'u ke lu tìfmetokit aftue a tsun frapol emziva'u.Ma omängum fra'uti, KAWKRR narmuyew ohe tsnì sutel alahe, flltxeyu alahe, txivìng tsatsenget fu tsayhìngit a ngenga ngamop fte ziva'u mìfìtseng fte tsun pivlltxe nìNa'vi nì'aw. Slä oeru txeleri a tsranten nìwotx lu tìngop horenä a tsun hivawnu ayhapxìt lì'fyayä leNa'vi a ayoengur ta Karyu Pawl zalma'u zìrya'usì. Kxawm fayhorenìri suteru nìpxay ke prrte' lu nìwotx, slä oe 'erefu nìlaw tsnì fìtxeleri oeyä tìfpìl lelun yey lu nìwotx. Txo oeyä fayhemìl 'iveko sì'efut ngengeyä nì'awfya ha mìsaswaw nìkllte menarit oheyä wìyìntxuyu nìyey ulte ta kxamtseng txe'lan oheyä tsap'alute sìyi nìwotx. Fì'uri PÄNUTÌNG oe, nìngay.'Awpeut fu 'awfesut ngengal new zivamunge mìfìtseng a txeleri frapor fra'usì kaltxì seruyi oe nìwotx.Rutxe spaw, ulte 'ivong Na'vi!Nìmun, irayo.Nìfyatxe'lan,  ta Prrton'Upx.ìm: Talun fayteleri tsranten nìtxan ulte kop tìtslam atsleng lehrrap lu, txo ngar prrte' livu, ha oel fìupxaret ateng nìÌnglìsì ngar fa *meyl* ayey fpìyeie. Oe law lu fì'u a tslam...  Ral ke law lu aylì'u san "sì'efut" sìk sì san "wìyìtxuyu" sìk...  Oe fpìl futa aylì'u tsreranten fpa ngeyä 'upxare, slä oe ke omum fìlun.Fpìl oel futa nga plltxe tsnì new ngivop horen fìtsengeyä srak?  Ke omum oel lun a nga pereng oer, mì fìtsenge oe lapo sì kea eyktan.  Nga lu 'awpo a ngop horen mì fìtsenge, fì'u nga tìftxey lu.Txo ke oel ngayä 'upxare tsolam, rutxe nga piveng oeru, ke new oe lu ketslusam.

Ma oeyä 'eylan,Oeyä tìfmi tìplltxeyä nìlaw nì'ul fpi meral melì'uyä a.ke.law a nga oeru pìlmuyeng:  (1) 'efu (to feel) >> tì.'efu (feeling) >> aysì'efu >> sì'efu(-t/ti (nì'ekotu))  (2) wìyìtxuyu >> zene livu w•ìy•ìntx•uy•u (will immediately humbly show)        Oe zekwä s•a.l.m•i nìkeyey. Oeru txoa livu, ma tsmukan.  Oel fperìl futa ngar lawa tìtslam 'upxareyä oeyä lu ulte nìmun ngaru irayo sereiyi oe nìwotx.Ngahu oe tsun pivängkxo mìfìtseng tsnì oeru frakrr prrte' laryuyu.

Fi'u kìng lu txan sìltsan! Oe faymi, slä oe lu ke txantslusam. Oe tìkin tslolam txan nì'ul Na'vi lì'fya. Oeyä aylì'u lu ke nìhawng ngim. Oe lu namume sì nerume fa ayngayä aylì'u. Oe kxeyey fpìl sami. Oe lu ke fìtseng tengfya 'eveng, slä rutxe run oeyä aykeyey.

Ma Tengfya swizaw, Kaltxì!Txo oel tsun ngeyä 'upxaret tslivam nìeyawr, ngaru prrte' livu txo ngeyä lì'olori 'awpol tivìng sìkenongit nìNa'vi nì'awla. Txo tìtslam oeyä keyawr lu ha oheru txoa ngengata livuyu.Oheru tìyuyìng lahea ayfya'o tìplltxeyä a kxawm livu ayral nìteng a fko tsun tsive'a nìne'em:     Fì.kìng txantsan l•ei•u! Oe fm•ay•i, slä fìtxan txantslusam ke l•än•gu.     Oeru l•er•u tìkin a tsl•iv•am lì'fyati leNa'vi nì'ul nìtxan.   FU  Oel kerin futa tsl•iv•am (oel) lì'fyati leNa'vi nì'ul nìtxan.     Oeyä aylì'u lu ke nìhawng ngim.  FU  Oeyä aylì'u lu ke ngim nìhawng. (Nìteng tsun tsl•iv•am nìlaw nìftue!)       Oe nerume fa ayngeyä aylì'u.  FU  Ngeyä aylì'u oeru tìsrung (asìltsan) l•er•u fte tsun (oe) n•iv•ume (nìwin nì'ul / nìltsan / nìftue nì'ul).     Oel fpìl futa kxeye sami.  FU  Oel fp•er•ìl futa kxeye s•i•m•v•i ('awkrr / nì'it / nìpxay / ke nì'it nì'aw ).     Fìtsengìri oe ke '•er•efu tengfya 'eveng, slä rutxe, run keyeyt oeyä (ulte oeru tsayt wìntxu).Txo ne'em livu ral a nga ke tsun tslivam, rutxe oeru peng fte oe tsun pìyevlltxe nìlaw fa*spoìler* nì'ittìsrung. Oe tsun tivìng nì'awla nìÌnglìsì/nìNinongo/nìEspanyol nìftue fu txo fmivi nìftxavang ha kxawm kop nìFransey tsun livu nìteng. Rutxe peng oeru ngeyä tìftxeyti nìprrte'. Peseng kä <iv> mì lì'u ralpeng?  Mì ral- fu -peng?  Krr mune aylì'ul 'awsiteng yìm ulte lì'u kemä slu, <iv> peseng kelku si?
Oe spaw a <iv>ìl kä mì ralit.  <<rivalpeng>>ru piveng, ke <<ralivpeng>>.EDIT:  <iv> kä mì ral-.
Ha ke san ralpiveng, srak? Pefya omum ngal fì'ut?
San ral-peng sìk melì'u 'awsiteng ha san peng sìk slu san piveng sìk.  Fu 'awsiteng nìmun lu san ralpiveng sìk.
Oe fpìl a <iv> kä mì hapxìyä lì'u eo txìm.San ral sìk lu muna ne txìm ulte san peng sìk lu txìm.Fìfya <iv> lu na <ay>, <ìy>, <ìm>, <am>, <ol>, <er>, <ìrm>, <arm>sì.Slä oel tse'a ngeyä ralit.

I took a crack at it, just to see if I could.  Aside from that doozy of a sentence, it's pretty straightforward.Hello, friends.to word-father (creator word-way's Na'vi's) grammar NOM-grant us it request is with Na'vi-ish message for the sake of us with subject voices our is what?I'm not sure how to parse this into English exactly (that's a hell of a sentence), but Prrton seems to be saying we shouldn't wait for Frommer to release a Na'viyan grammar.help can do who?Who can help us?we together can stand and this message can create how?How can we stand together and create this message?our leader time do spirit strong enough can be who?Who can have a strong enough spirit to be our leader now?this thing to start one person be yes/no?Can one person start this thing?this path following us proliferate by wait?Will we proliferate by following this path and waiting?this dance ready who is?Who is ready for this dance?Interesting neologisms Prrton has come up with here:li'usempul - word-father - Dr. Frommer, himself.  I imagine he'd be flattered by such a title.lì'utìtäftxurenuti - word-NOM-weave-pattern-NOM - grammar.  Kind of a mouthful, but then again, Na'vi don't have a written language, or even other languages to compare their own to, aside from 'inglisi.  After all, with access to the memories in ayutral Amokriya, their language must be remarkably static over the centuries.  I imagine it was quite a shock for them when midgets came down from the sky and started speaking gibberish.lìfya - word-way - language.  Nice, considering that canonically the only way to say "I speak Na'vi" is to say "I speak like one of the people."  Makes sense - if Na'vi is the only language you know of, why bother having a word for language at all?
